alert.note: Alert for Box Butte; Scotts Bluff; South Sioux (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 14 at 7:22PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Box Butte, north central Scotts Bluff and southeastern Sioux Counties through 700 PM MDT... At 622 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles north of Lake Alice, or 16 miles north of Scottsbluff, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lake Alice. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Box Butte; Scotts Bluff; South Sioux
